title: Thermal Energy System Models
description: An open dataset for thermal energy system models. Components include heat pumps, Combined Heat and Power (CHP) plants, resistive heat sources, thermal storage, concentrating solar thermal plants and desalination

sources.name: Techno-economic and spatial analysis of vertical ground source heat pump systems in Germany
Mapping and analyses of the current and future (2020 - 2030)  - Work package 2: Assessment of the technologies for the year 2012 heating/cooling fuel deployment (fossil/renewables)
Technology data for Energy Plants - Individual Heating Plants and Energy Transport
Technology Data for Energy Plants for Electricity and District heating generation August 2016
Technology data for Energy Plants - Generation of Electricity and District Heating, Energy Storage and Energy Carrier Generation and Conversion
